French: Je n'ai pas besoin de sieste.
Je n'ai pas besoin de partenaire.
Je suis conscient de la possibilité.

English: She is blind to her own {{c::beauty}}.

French: Je suis de la côte ouest.

English: I wasn't the one who {{c::wrote}} this.
I wasn't the one who wrote this.
What can i do about it?
